A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This thing was almost as bad as Jurassic World. A complete misunderstanding of what Star Wars is about. They took it away from Lucas exactly so we wouldn't get a repeat of the prequels and now that's pretty much what we got. At least in the prequels we only had to endure Jar Jar Binks. Ever character in this Movie is fodder for ridiculous I'll timed comedy. So disappointed.
